metadata.title: CVE-2024-45014 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:s390/boot: Avoid possible physmem_info segment corruptionWhen physical memory for the kernel image is allocated it does notconsider extra memory required for offsetting the image start tomatch it with the lower 20 bits of KASLR virtual base address. Thatmight lead to kernel access beyond its memory range.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
